summary: This is an FBI evidence collection log documenting the seizure of a DVR controller and a DVR system from the Metropolitan Corrections Center in New York on August 15, 2019, as part of the death investigation of Jeffrey Epstein. The document records the specific hardware details and chain of custody.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject of the death investigation for which the DVR evidence was seized from the Metropolitan Corrections Center.

events.title: Seizure of DVR Evidence from MCC
events.description: FBI Special Agent seized a Dell Powerridge 8420 DVR Controller and a DVR System #1 (NICE VISION PRO Digital Video & Audio Recorder) from the Metropolitan Corrections Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Corrections Center (MCC), 150 Park Row, New York, New York
keyFacts: The FBI seized digital video recording equipment from the Metropolitan Corrections Center on August 15, 2019, as part of the Jeffrey Epstein death investigation.
The seized items included a Dell Powerridge 8420 DVR Controller and a DVR System #1 (NICE VISION PRO recorder) with a disk array chassis containing 16 hard drives.
The document is an official FBI evidence log, indicating a formal investigation into the circumstances surrounding Epstein's death was underway.
The seizure occurred at the MCC, the federal detention facility where Jeffrey Epstein died.
